quality_assessment: Reference page is comprehensive but has inaccurate source line references and one incorrect default value for memory storage

issues.description: Documentation states max_memory default is 1GB (1073741824 bytes), but the actual code default is 100MB (100 * 1024 * 1024 = 104857600 bytes)
issues.fix_suggestion: Update max_memory default value to 104857600 (100MB) to match MemoryConfig::default() implementation

issues.description: Source line reference 'src/config/mod.rs:51-59, 88-100' is inaccurate. The GlobalConfig Default impl is at lines 108-120
issues.fix_suggestion: Update source line reference to reflect current code location

issues.description: Source line reference 'src/config/mod.rs:66-74' is inaccurate. The ProjectConfig struct is at lines 83-92
issues.fix_suggestion: Update source line reference to reflect current code location

issues.description: Source line reference 'src/storage/config.rs:24-55, 228-241' is inaccurate. The StorageConfig struct is at lines 25-56, and the Default impl is at lines 229-241
issues.fix_suggestion: Update source line reference to reflect current code location

issues.description: Source line reference 'src/storage/config.rs:66-86, 196-198' is inaccurate. The FileConfig struct is at lines 67-87
issues.fix_suggestion: Update source line reference to reflect current code location

issues.description: Source line reference 'src/storage/config.rs:89-111, 200-201' is inaccurate. The MemoryConfig struct is at lines 90-102, and Default impl is at lines 104-112
issues.fix_suggestion: Update source line reference to reflect current code location

issues.description: Source line reference 'src/storage/config.rs:114-147, 204-212' is inaccurate. The RetryPolicy struct is at lines 115-136, Default impl at lines 138-147
issues.fix_suggestion: Update source line reference to reflect current code location

issues.description: Source line reference 'src/storage/config.rs:150-173' is inaccurate. The CacheConfig struct is at lines 151-164, Default impl at lines 166-173
issues.fix_suggestion: Update source line reference to reflect current code location

issues.description: Source line reference 'src/cook/command.rs:28-29' is inaccurate. The CookCommand struct defines max_iterations with default_value="1" at line 28-29, and path at line 17-23
issues.fix_suggestion: Update source line reference to include the full struct range for clarity

issues.description: Source line reference 'src/config/command.rs:130-154, src/config/mod.rs:363-365' is inaccurate. CommandMetadata struct is at lines 132-154 in command.rs
issues.fix_suggestion: Update source line reference. Note: default values are applied via apply_command_defaults() in command_validator.rs, not in mod.rs

issues.description: Reference page lacks MkDocs Material visual enhancements like admonitions, code annotations, or callouts for important notes
issues.fix_suggestion: Add info admonition for the 'How defaults work' section and tip admonition for the practical example

positive_aspects: Comprehensive coverage of all configuration default values
Clear table format for easy reference
Includes precedence flow explanation with visual diagram
Practical example demonstrating storage override configuration
Links to related environment variables documentation
Correct default values for most settings (log_level, max_concurrent_specs, auto_commit, pool_size, timeouts, retry policy, cache config)
improvement_suggestions: Replace hardcoded line numbers with stable anchors or section references that won't become stale
Add an admonition to highlight the importance of the precedence flow
Consider adding a note about the difference between 'None' defaults and actual fallback behavior
Add code annotations to the YAML example for enhanced clarity

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
